This item represents the Embri's @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.zXmNutA5dS2Nsdbu]{Shielded Thoughts} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.VDkg3njymk69GGs5]{Masked Emotions} features. modifiers.name: Masked Emotions
modifiers.notes: While wearing their mask, Embri are immune to magical charm effects and receive a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against enchantment spells and effects. When unmasked, an embri loses its immunity to  Charm effects and its +2 racial bonus to saving throws. In addition, while unmasked, it must roll twice for any Sense Motive check it attempts and take the lower result.
